void SetTheme (ThemeRecord theme, bool updateStorage=true)
This is setting the TextEditor's theme specifically. This is not to be confused with the AppOptions Themes which get applied at an application level. This allows for a "DarkTheme-Application" that has a "LightTheme-TextEditor".
void SetRenderStateKey (Key< RenderState > renderStateKey)
Task SetFromLocalStorageAsync ()
void WriteToStorage ()
TextEditorOptions GetOptions ()
One should store the result of invoking this method in a variable, then reference that variable. If one continually invokes this, there is no guarantee that the data had not changed since the previous invocation.
